name: The Dungeon Vendor
description:
Evil has gripped the land. The dark spaces of the world have become dungeons filled with despicable monsters and dangerous bosses. Heroes are beginning to rise up and try to take back our world, collecting what they find along the way. Now is the time for you to stand up… and take advantage of their need for quality merchandise. Traveling from dungeon to dungeon and meeting new heroes, you will craft powerful weapons to ensure their victory… for a tidy profit of course.

You are the Dungeon Vendor.

Features

  • Use different metals, leathers, gems, and runes, to create 1000's of unique weapon combinations.
  • Meet more than 70 different heroes each with unique backstories and motivations.
  • Explore 20 unique dungeon locations, each with their own descriptions.
  • Discover more than 50 different enemies with unique weaknesses that can be learned over time.
  • Obtain Boss Trophies and complete a large amount of Quests to get both in game achievements and Steam Achievements.
  • Forge your weapons by completing mini-games to achieve higher qualities to increase each heroes survivability.
  • Give your weapons custom names or use the randomizer.
  • As you play, you will discover information about dungeons and enemies which is journaled. Replaying the game will allow you to use this information to become more successful with each replay.
  • As you progress through the game you will get to know more of the vendor and his assistants backstory.
